field.label: Status
field.comment: Status.

field.label: Do you want to show the customer group?
field.comment: This allows the POS user/cashier to select the customer group on the POS customer registration form.

field.label: Default customer group
field.comment: Set the default customer group for POS customer.

field.label: Invoice Buttons Enable Time
field.comment: Set the time(In Seconds) for enabling the invoice buttons.

field.comment: Display Full Tax Summary

field.label: Hold Cart By Quote
field.comment: Hold Cart By Quote

field.label: Shipping Charge Breakup
field.comment: Shipping Charge Breakup

field.label: No. of Products visible on POS home screen
field.comment: Mention the number of products you want to see on POS home screen. Default: 50

field.label: No. of visible popular products
field.comment: Mention the number of most popular products you want to see in POS. Default: 20

field.label: Barcode Prefix
field.comment: Set barcode prefix. This works only if productID is selected in barcode generated

field.label: Generate Barcoded With
field.comment: Please make sure if you are choosing SKU or UPC for generating barcode, these should be unique for all the products otherwise, a barcode can be replaced in the case of duplicate SKU/UPC. No two products should have the same SKU/UPC

field.label: Get Product Multi Mrp API Url
Get Product Lot Info API Url
Sales Associates Status
field.comment: Sales Associates Status.

field.label: Price Zone By Pincode API Url
Get Ezetap Transaction Status API Url
Get Pinelabs Transaction Status API Url
Quotation Expire Time (In Minutes)
field.comment: Quotation will be expired after the provided time (In Minutes)

field.label: Create Promise API URL for Quotation
Email Time Interval
field.comment: Set time interval (in milliseconds) at which email sending will be processed at POS terminal. Default time interval will be 1000 milliseconds

field.label: Cashier Email Template For Cashier Login
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Cashier Login Email” to Cashier

field.label: Admin Email Template For Cashier Login
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Cashier Login Email” to Admin

field.label: Cashier Email Template For Cashier Logout
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Cashier Logout Email” to Cashier

field.label: Admin Email Template For Cashier Logout
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Cashier Logout Email” to Admin

field.label: Cashier Email Template For Terminal Reset
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Terminal Reset Email” to Cashier

field.label: Admin Email Template For Terminal Reset
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Terminal Reset Email” to Admin

field.label: Admin Email Template For Custom Product Add
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Custom Product Add Email” to Admin

field.label: Admin Email Template For Hold Cart
field.comment: Select the Email Template which will be used while sending “Hold Cart Email” to Admin

field.label: Category ID
field.comment: Enter multiple Category ID with “,” for which check in condition.

field.label: Terms and Conditions one
field.comment: Terms and Conditions

field.label: Terms and Conditions two
field.comment: Terms and Conditions for L1 category

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Size Unit
field.comment: Set the barcode label sticker size unit in which you will set the width and height of the label sticker below. Mostly mm is used for sticker size

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Width
field.comment: Barcode Label Sticker Width

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Height
field.comment: Barcode Label Sticker Height

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Margin Top (in px)
field.comment: Set margin top of the contents which will be in label sticker. Default:0px

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Margin Right (in px)
field.comment: Set margin right of the contents which will be in label sticker. Default:0px

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Margin Bottom (in px)
field.comment: Set margin bottom of the contents which will be in label sticker. Default:0px

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Margin Left (in px)
field.comment: Set margin left of the contents which will be in label sticker. Default:0px

field.label: Barcode Print Code Font Size (in px)
field.comment: Barcode character code font size (in px)

field.label: Barcode Print Content Font Size (in px)
field.comment: Barcode sticker content font size (in px)

field.label: Barcode Label Sticker Price Currency
field.comment: Set currency which will be used to convert and format the product price and print in label sticker
